theme.desc: A customized theme definition (see examples above)

useDefaultTheme.desc: Used as a placeholder when theming is turned off (replaces `setBothColors` in [QColorizeMixin](https://github.com/hawkeye64/q-colorize-mixin) mixin)

color.desc: Any color from the [Quasar Color Pallete](https://quasar.dev/style/color-palette) or a CSS color (#, rgb, rgba, hls, etc)

bgColor.desc: Any color from the [Quasar Color Pallete](https://quasar.dev/style/color-palette) or a CSS color (#, rgb, rgba, hls, etc)

data.desc: Typically the `{ }` of a render function

returns.desc: The passed in `data` with no modifications

getThemeColors.desc: Returns a Map of theme items based on passed in keys

keys.desc: An array of keys to return from the `theme` object

returns.desc: Returns a Map of theme items based on passed in keys
